nodes.text: Group C was an Imperial military formation on the planet Venaari under the overall command of Major Gaevril Daraada. Consisting of a single SV-50 Swift-Strike Speeder piloted by two crew with a pair of stormtroopers, Group C was neutralized by Sienn Sconn and Shandria L'hnnar. The pair stole the strike speeder to escape from Imperial forces.
